title: Online Discussion-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Mathematics instructional design course with asynchronous discussions in LMS environments for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze mathematical problem-solving processes using a constructive argumentation approach.
Learners can apply structured interaction strategies for collaborative knowledge construction in online discussions.
Learners can design discussion topics for collaborative exploration of mathematical concepts in an LMS environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
